items.title: Trump, and home buyers, could get their wish for lower mortgage rates — if markets cooperate
items.description: The president’s focus on the 10-year Treasury yield is part of Trump’s efforts to bring down mortgage rates, a promise during his campaign.

items.title: Canopy Growth’s drop in adult-use pot sales snuffs out cannabis-stock momentum
items.description: Canopy’s stock reversed on earnings after seeing a rally sparked by the possibility of marijuana reform in the U.S.

items.title: Frontier Air’s stock rallies as its rosier outlook, new routes wow Wall Street
